metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"# Dashboard for NSG flow logs 

If you find a bug, please open an issue to [kongou-ae/nsgflowlog-dashboard](https://github.com/kongou-ae/nsgflowlog-dashboard/issues)."},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"5064ee2a-52d8-4d1b-9b97-e0c3fb5249eb","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"TimeRange_p","label":"TimeRange","type":4,"isRequired":true,"value":{"durationMs":86400000},"typeSettings":{"selectableValues":[{"durationMs":300000},{"durationMs":900000},{"durationMs":1800000},{"durationMs":3600000},{"durationMs":14400000},{"durationMs":86400000}],"allowCustom":true},"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"Duration"},{"id":"6fe7638b-0034-440f-8a3c-47e96a4c19f6","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"SrcIP_p","label":"SrcIP","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"Duration","value":""},{"id":"c12ff02e-a187-4042-8e1c-2d8a1b598324","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"DestIP_p","label":"DestIP","type":1,"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"timeContextFromParameter":"Duration"},{"id":"d2817199-5f21-4885-94e1-73010f6172a3","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Protocol_p","label":"Protocol","type":2,"multiSelect":true,"quote":"'","delimiter":",","value":["value::all"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":["value::all"],"showDefault":false},"jsonData":"[
    { "value":"ICMP", "label":"icmp" },
    { "value":"TCP", "label":"tcp" },
    { "value":"UDP", "label":"udp"}
]","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"defaultValue":"value::all"},{"id":"ff7050e4-42f5-4a71-a5ae-e0b993d2249b","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Port_p","label":"Port","type":1,"value":"","timeContext":{"durationMs":1800000}},{"id":"4cd12e0e-e88e-49de-8afa-4ab866d5beff","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"Status_p","type":2,"multiSelect":true,"quote":"'","delimiter":",","query":"let nsgData = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| extend system = NSGList_s
| extend srcIP = iff(isempty(SrcIP_s), split(SrcPublicIPs_s, "|")[0], SrcIP_s)
| extend dstIP = iff(isempty(DestIP_s), split(DestPublicIPs_s, "|")[0], DestIP_s)
| extend matchedPolicy = strcat(NSGList_s, "|", NSGRule_s)
| extend Status = case(FlowStatus_s == "A", "Accept", FlowStatus_s == "D", "Deny", "unknown")
| extend Protocol = case(L4Protocol_s == "T", "TCP", L4Protocol_s == "U", "UDP", "unknown") 
| extend DestPort = replace(@'.0',@'',tostring(DestPort_d))
| extend logtime = FlowStartTime_t
| project logtime, system, srcIP, dstIP, Protocol, DestPort, Status, matchedPolicy;
let nvaData = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Fortinet"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "cat=" category ";" *
| where category == "traffic:forward"
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "eventtime=" unixlogtime ";" *
| parse AdditionalExtensions with * "policyid=" matchedPolicy ";" *
| extend system = DeviceExternalID
| extend logtime = unixtime_seconds_todatetime(toint(unixlogtime))
| extend srcIP = SourceIP
| extend dstIP = DestinationIP
| extend Status = DeviceAction
| extend Protocol = case(Protocol == "6", "TCP", Protocol == "17", "UDP", "others") 
| extend DestPort = tostring(DestinationPort)
| project logtime, system, srcIP, dstIP, Protocol, DestPort, Status, matchedPolicy;
nsgData | union nvaData
| sort by logtime desc
| summarize by Status
","value":["value::all"],"typeSettings":{"additionalResourceOptions":["value::all"],"showDefault":false},"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"defaultValue":"value::all","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","label":"Status"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| extend SrcIP = iff(isempty(SrcIP_s), split(SrcPublicIPs_s, "|")[0], SrcIP_s)
| extend DestIP = iff(isempty(DestIP_s), split(DestPublicIPs_s, "|")[0], DestIP_s)
| extend Status = case(FlowStatus_s == "A", "Accept", FlowStatus_s == "D", "Deny", "unknown")
| extend Protocol = case(L4Protocol_s == "T", "TCP", L4Protocol_s == "U", "UDP", "unknown") 
| extend NSGList_s_array = split(NSGList_s,"/")
| extend NsgId = strcat("/subscriptions/", NSGList_s_array[0], "/resourcegroups/", NSGList_s_array[1], "/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/", NSGList_s_array[2]) 
| extend DestPort = replace(@'\.0',@'', tostring(DestPort_d))
| project FlowStartTime = FlowStartTime_t, SrcIP, DestIP, Protocol, DestPort, Status, NsgId, NSGRule_s
| where FlowStartTime {TimeRange_p}
| where Status in ({Status_p})
| where SrcIP like '{SrcIP_p}'
| where DestIP like '{DestIP_p}'
| where DestPort like '{Port_p}'
| where Protocol in ({Protocol_p})
| sort by FlowStartTime desc","size":0,"showAnalytics":true,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":500,"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"FlowStartTime"},{"columnId":"SrcIP"},{"columnId":"DestIP"},{"columnId":"Protocol"},{"columnId":"DestPort"},{"columnId":"Status"},{"columnId":"NsgId"},{"columnId":"NSGRule_s"}]},"sortBy":[]},"name":"query - 2"}],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":["Azure Monitor"]}
